name: Elleros Origins: Season I
description: Experience the land of Elleros, a complete open world for you to explore in any way you choose. From exploring ancient caves to battling corrupted necromancers, Elleros enables you to play the way you choose. Every 400 years a cataclysm wipes out all life. The last cataclysm was 399 years ago.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 770 / AMD GPU Radeon R9 290 Storage: 29 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 3770 3.4 GHz / AMD CPU AMD FX-8350 4 GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 980 / AMD GPU Radeon R9 290 Storage: 29 GB available space
